ProductInfo.Features:
Video and Audio: - Video Input Signal: 1.0Vpp, 75ohm internal impedance - Bandwidth of Video Signal: 5.0Mhz typ - Audio Input Signal: 3.0Vpp max, 22k ohm internal impedance
DC Power and Link Out: - DC Out: DC 12V, 0.5A max. - Link Out with DC In: Link signal output and DC Power Input, 27VDC Max.
Connection: - Video Input: BNC Socket - Audio Input: BNC Socket - DC Out: DC Plug(5.5/2.0mm) - Link Out: BNC Socket
Transmit over 1500 ft with one single coaxial cable
15V-27VDC variable power included to amplifier weaker signals
ProductInfo.Name: Biwave VDS2100/2200 Video/Audio Transmission Set over 1500 ft in one coaxial cable
